[structural-selection.input.ts 9:12-9:20] userData
[structural-selection.input.ts 10:12-10:21] userCache

[structural-selection.input.ts 12:-14:]
    getUserById(id: string) {
        return this.userData[id];
    }
[structural-selection.input.ts 12:-14:]

[structural-selection.input.ts 16:-19:]
    updateUserData(id: string, data: any) {
        this.userData[id] = data;
        this.userCache.set(id, data);
    }
[structural-selection.input.ts 16:-19:]

[structural-selection.input.ts 21:-23:]
    clearUserCache() {
        this.userCache.clear();
    }
[structural-selection.input.ts 21:-23:]

[structural-selection.input.ts 25:-27:]
    fetchUserFromAPI(id: string) {
        return fetch(`/api/users/${id}`);
    }
[structural-selection.input.ts 25:-27:]
